game.name: The Girl Walks Back
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 음량 개별 조정, 마우스 전용 옵션, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: "The Girl Walks Back" is a dark, stage-based monochrome puzzle-adventure played only with the mouse. The girl attempts to return home from a deep forest. No complex controls are needed, but obstacles must be overcome through puzzles or action. Your choices lead to 8 different endings.
game.shortDescriptionEn: "The Girl Walks Back" is a dark, stage-based monochrome puzzle-adventure played only with the mouse. The girl attempts to return home from a deep forest. No complex controls are needed, but obstacles must be overcome through puzzles or action. Your choices lead to 8 different endings.
